Header.title: Welcome to HormonalCare
Header.paragraph: The platform that manages the treatment of diabetes diseases.

Features.title: Features
Features.paragraph: HormonalCare offers a variety of features designed to enhance your hormonal health experience. From private messaging to business solutions, we have everything you need to stay connected and healthy.

columns.title: 24/7 Support
columns.text: Our team is available at all times to answer your questions and provide assistance.

columns.title: Updates
columns.text: Stay informed with our latest news and platform improvements.

columns.title: Community
columns.text: Join our user community and share your experiences.

columns.title: Solutions
columns.text: Discover how our tools can transform your hormonal health experience.

Pricing.title: Pricing
Pricing.paragraph: Choose the plan that best suits your needs and start enjoying the benefits of HormonalCare. All our plans include access to all features and future updates.

Services.title: Our Services
Services.paragraph: HormonalCare offers a variety of services designed to enhance your hormonal health experience. From private messaging to business solutions, we have everything you need to stay connected and healthy.

columns.name: Private Messaging
columns.text: With end-to-end encryption, your personal messages and calls are secure, ensuring that only you and the recipient can access them.

columns.name: Group Chats
columns.text: Easily stay connected with friends and family through group conversations.

columns.name: Express Yourself
columns.text: Use stickers, GIFs, and voice messages to share your emotions and everyday moments.

columns.name: Business Solutions
columns.text: Transform your business by reaching customers worldwide, showcasing products, and building relationships with WhatsApp Business.

columns.name: Voice and Video Calls
columns.text: Feel close to your loved ones with high-quality voice and video calls, no matter where they are.

Testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
Testimonials.paragraph: Our users have experienced significant improvements in their hormonal health thanks to HormonalCare. Here are some testimonials from our satisfied clients.

columns.text: "Sometimes I find it hard to follow everything to the letter, but an app that reminds and supports me would be like having constant help. That would give me more confidence in my daily life."
columns.name: Joaquin Benavides

columns.text: "Before, it was complicated to constantly follow up, but now I see how an app could centralize patient data and give us useful alerts. It would be a real change in our practice."
columns.name: Luis Chinchihualpa

columns.text: "It made me think about how much time we waste looking for information. If everything were on a single platform, we could act faster and more accurately in each consultation."
columns.name: Ricardo Duran

columns.text: "What I liked the most was imagining the patient educating themselves with digital support. If technology adapts to the pace of the clinic, we all save time and improve quality."
columns.name: Roxana Podesta

columns.text: "I always felt like I was handling this alone. Seeing an option that connects with my doctor and gives me clarity at the right moment completely changes how I view my treatment."
columns.name: Sebastian Chacayan

columns.text: "I realized that many times I don't fully understand what to do. A simple guide on my phone could help me avoid mistakes and make everything less stressful."
columns.name: Yudi Pariona

Team.title: Meet the Team
Team.paragraph: Our team is made up of passionate students from the Faculty of Engineering and Sciences at the Peruvian University of Applied Sciences (UPC). We are committed to improving medical monitoring and hormonal health in Peru.

About.title: About Us
About.paragraph: Toiota is a startup formed by students from the Faculty of Engineering and Sciences at the Peruvian University of Applied Sciences (UPC), dedicated to optimizing medical monitoring. Our vision is to address the existing challenges in the Peruvian healthcare system, especially in the monitoring of hormonal diseases.
Why2: Adapted to the Peruvian healthcare system

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.description: If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact us. We are here to help you.
